title: Romancing The Shifter
description: A Shapeshifter Paranormal Romance & Urban Fantasy AnthologyYou can never have enough shifters...Filled to the brim with strong, smexy alpha males, heroines who know what they want, and affectionate shifters of all kinds, this collection will deliver hours of delicious, happily-ever-after reads from bestselling and award-winning paranormal romance and urban fantasy authors.If you yearn for captivating tales of big burly bears, fiery dragons, stealthy wolf shifters, and other supernatural creatures like vampires, demons, witches, and more, then Romancing the Shifter will satisfy your every desire. Crawl into these fantasy worlds, get lost in love affairs that are written in the stars, and find your next book boyfriend.
author: Erzabet Bishop
